title: Smoking the Unicorns
itunes:title: Smoking the Unicorns
description:
Today we unveil our 2016 Cigar Ambassadors of the Year Award from Cigar Journal Magazine, and we will be smoking Debonaire Daybreak, The American, Jose El Piedra, and the Brickhouse Connecticut in the first hour. In the second hour, we will light up Smokin’ Ass…

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority!
